```go
package main
import "fmt"
func main() {
    movie_year := 1999
    movie_title := "The Matrix"
    fmt.Printf("In %s, %s was released.\n", movie_year, movie_title)
}
```

```go
package main
import "fmt"
func main() {
        msg:="Hello"
        fmt.Println(msg) 
}
```

```go
package main
import "fmt"
func main() {
        msg := "Hello"
        fmt.Println(msg)
}
```

```go
package main
import "fmt"
func main() {
    fmt.Println("This program runs in any OS!")
}
```

```go
GOOS=windows go build -o app.exe
GOOS=linux go build -o app
```
